name: Falcon
tagline: specification of the Falcon protocol for currency transfer
body:
### FALCON.
Soon this will be updated with the specifications of the Falcon global value transfer protocol.

![A falcon, catching a swift.](http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2009/06/29/article-1196206-0583D016000005DC-359_634x445.jpg)
